Package com.behreajj.camzup.friendly

Class MaterialAwt

java.lang.Object
com.behreajj.camzup.core.EntityData
com.behreajj.camzup.core.Material
com.behreajj.camzup.friendly.MaterialAwt
public class MaterialAwt extends Material
A material which supports Images as textures.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    MaterialAwt.Sample
    Organizes the corners used to sample an image, expressed as integer pixel coordinates.
